A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I had high hopes for TLJ going in\, and while it did prove to be better than TFA (not a high bar) it ended up doing more damage long run in the destruction of Luke Skywalker's character. The Ben/Rey stuff was great\, Canto Bight was wholly unnecessary. It really appears the new directors/KK are only concerned with the new characters and are pushing the old ones out by any means necessary.
